name: Simple 1500 Series: Vol.55 - The Darts
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

A title with a slightly sophisticated taste.
More than 6 types of representative darts games are included: Score, Up, 301, 501, Cricket and Chess.
Using an analog-input system, this new darts game allows up to 4 people to play together.
What is the real identity of the mysterious Dartsman?
An American comics-style Story Mode is also included.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
??
